tool_description: Bulk WHOIS API. Parsed to JSON. All TLDs supported.   Online since 2016.
name: Bulk WHOIS
title: Bulk WHOIS

api_list.name: Get WHOIS batch
Bulk WHOIS

optional_parameters.name: ip
optional_parameters.description: IP address. Will get resolved to domain.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: json: rich, structured json, raw: raw data, split: formatted lines

api_list.name: Get your WHOIS batches
api_list.description: Get a list of your batches.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pointsdb-bulk-whois-v1.p.rapidapi.com/batch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pointsdb-bulk-whois-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pointsdb-bulk-whois-v1.p.rapidapi.com/batch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pointsdb-bulk-whois-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
